item.title: Centos not going anywhere stop spreading the FUD
item.description: Iâ€™m sure you have heard about the open letter from Centos regarding not having control of some key elements of the project and the AWOL admin. I purposely did not comment on this because I did not want to spread any FUD. Centos is a huge project, I had no doubt that things would get rectified in a timely manner. Here is the latest The CentOS Development team had a routine meeting today with Lance Davis in attendance.
